# Agar - Kivy
Kivy client for `datek-agar-core`.
The project is in early development stage.

## Usage
After installation, run the `agar-kivy` command.

## Controls
increase speed: &#8593;  
decrease speed: &#8595;  
turn left: &#8592;  
turn right: &#8594;
